pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Global-Local Gaussian Process Approximation // A global- local approximation framework for large-scale Gaussian process modeling. Please see Vakayil and Joseph (2024) doi:10.1080/00401706.2023.2296451 for details. This work is supported by U.S. NSF grants CMMI-1921646 and DMREF-1921873.
